text: Zeng Yan (; born July 28, 1985), is a Chinese neo-folk musician from Chengdu, Sichuan.http://dailynews.sina.com/bg/ent/film/sinacn/20091129/0703915067.html So far, she has released 3 studio albums and one soundtrack LP.http://www.weibo.com/u/1706475904 She is known for her whisperish vocals and for her experimental folk sound. ==Discography== === Studio albums === * 2010: I Am Singing A Dreamhttp://www.yesasia.com/us/i-am-singing-a-dream- china-version/1023099642-0-0-0-en/info.html * 2012: Onehttp://www.weibo.com/p/10151501_100027598?from=page_100406_home&wvr;=5.1&mod;=musicpiecesingle&coflag;=profile_yinyueren_homezuopinhttp://www.yesasia.com/us/one- china-version/1027259372-0-0-0-en/info.html * 2012: Viehttp://www.weibo.com/p/10151501_100056752?from=page_100406_home&wvr;=5.1&mod;=musicpiecesingle&coflag;=profile_yinyueren_homezuopinhttp://www.yesasia.com/us/vie- china-version/1032153924-0-0-0-en/info.html === Soundtrack album === * 2011: Great Wall My Love Original Soundtrackhttp://www.yesasia.com/us/great-wall-my- love-original-soundtrack-china-version/1025901367-0-0-0-en/info.html === Singles === * 2010: "Song For Home Pray For Soul"http://www.yesasia.com/us/song-for-home-pray-for-soul-china- version/1023031741-0-0-0-en/info.html == References == ==External links== *http://www.weibo.com/u/1706475904 *http://blog.sina.com.cn/u/1706475904 *https://www.facebook.com/kykko.zengyan *http://dailynews.sina.com/bg/ent/film/sinacn/20091129/0703915067.html Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female singers Category:Musicians from Chengdu Category:Asian Wave contestants Category:21st- century Chinese singers Category:21st-century women singers
title: Zeng Yan
